courses.description: Learn how to design and build robotic systems from mechanical components to intelligent control systems.
courses.title: Robotics

courses.description: Study the integration of mechanical and electronic systems used in robotics and automation.
courses.title: Mechatronics Engineering

courses.description: Explore the principles of motion, force, and energy to understand the mechanics behind robotic movements.
courses.title: Mechanical Engineering

courses.description: Master the skills needed to program robot behaviors, including perception, decision-making, and control.
courses.title: Artificial Intelligence

courses.description: Understand circuit design and embedded systems, which are fundamental for developing robotic hardware.
courses.title: Electrical Engineering

courses.description: Learn how to simulate and optimize robotic movements through mathematical models and algorithms.
courses.title: Control Systems
